t: Are any of your wipes scented?
Amazon.com: HUGGIES Simply Clean Fragrance-Free Baby Wipes,Soft Packs, 648 Total Wipes,72 Count (Pack of 9) : Baby
s: These Unscented Wipes by Huggies are great. They are thick and stretchy. They do not rip while you are wiping even the toughest, nastiest messes. They are wet enough to clean faces and sticky hands but they are not drippy wet like other brands I have tried in the past.

t: Amazon.com : Huggies Simply Clean Unscented Baby Wipes, 9 Flip-Top Packs (576 Wipes Total),64 Count (Pack of 9) : Everything Else
s: We change diapers for people with disabilities including incontinence. Many wipes are thin, too small to cover the hand of the changer, not soft. Simply unsuitable for the job. Huggies are worth the extra price over bargain brands that require twice as many wipes, negating any savings at all.

t: Huggies® Simply Clean® Fragrance Free Baby Wipes

t: Amazon.com: Customer Questions & Answers
s: They’re super soft and have clean ingredients. It’s crazy because the Huggies Simply clean are one of my LEAST favorites. They’re SO rough and made my baby’s booty so red and have a little blood while using them. Crazy how they’re the same brand but completely different.
